meanings.definition: A general description covering the main points of a subject
meanings.sent1: The teacher provided us with clear outlines of the lesson.
meanings.sent2: She drew the outlines of the story on the whiteboard.
meanings.sent3: The outlines of the plan were so detailed, it made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: His speech followed the outlines of a well-crafted argument.
meanings.sent5: The outlines of the map helped us navigate through the forest.

meanings.definition: A line or set of lines enclosing or indicating the shape of an object or figure
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully traced the outlines of the flower.
meanings.sent2: The outlines of the building were sharp against the sky.
meanings.sent3: The outlines of the cloud resembled a fluffy bunny.
meanings.sent4: The outlines of the mountain stood boldly against the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The outlines of the puzzle pieces helped him solve the game.

meanings.definition: To sketch or draw the outline of something
meanings.sent1: She outlines the shape of the tree before painting it.
meanings.sent2: He outlines the characters before starting to write the story.
meanings.sent3: The artist outlines the cat with a playful flick of the brush.
meanings.sent4: The architect outlines the building with precision and care.
meanings.sent5: He outlines the plan for the project on a large sheet of paper.
